constituent: turf, flowers, of, Zorro, building blocks, zig-zag
koohiiStory1: Artificial turf made easy: flowers stuck on top of building blocks that you can place anywhere.
koohiiStory2: Zorro, with a flower between his teeth for the ladies, defends his turf against evildoers. "This is my turf! And this...is for the lady.".
words:
